Setting up your Mobile App Notification Settings

WhatNew Notification Settings

Configure when you'd like to receive push notifications on your iOS or Android device.

  • A streamer you follow goes live
  • A stream you've bookmarked goes live
  • Anytime someone @mentions you in a livestream
  • Someone starts following you

Chat Tagging Preferences

  • Everyone (default): Notified anytime someone tags you
  • Following only: Only notified when someone you follow tags you
  • No one: Not notified about @mentions in chat
